INSERT INTO TASK(taskId, workspaceId, startDate, endDate, taskContent, taskSeq, statusId, createdAt) VALUES(#{taskId}, #{workspaceId}, TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'RR/MM/DD'), TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'RR/MM/DD'), #{taskContent}, #{taskSeq}, #{statusId}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT t.taskId taskId, t.workspaceId workspaceId, t.startDate startDate, t.endDate endDate, t.taskContent taskContent, t.taskSeq taskSeq, t.statusId statusId, ts.status status, t.createdAt createdAt FROM TASK t JOIN TASKSTATUS ts ON t.statusId = ts.statusId WHERE t.workspaceId = #{workspaceId} ORDER BY statusId, taskSeq
